tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Treatment,Dental Fillings,
review:
Dr Chaitanya saved my teeth and I can't thank her enough. She was a angel disguised as a dentist.
When I went to her I was in severe pain and the infection was so bad that I almost collapsed . Due to lockdown I had to wait and even went to a neighbourhood dentist (I'm still shuddering at what she did) & Clove dental ( who made it even worse)  and after bad cust service at clove decided to visit Chaitanya for the first time after a close friend referred her to me.
She is an amazing dentist and not money monided unlike some I have visited in the past.
The infection was so severe that my face had swollen up. She patiently and hyginically has been treating me last couple of weeks ( 3 fillings and 2 RCT) 
I would prefer her to anyone and everyone. She's an amazing dentist . Surely one of the best on east side  of Bangalore.  If there was a 5 star rating I would give her 6.
Her clinic is so clean and spotless and the place and equipment santitzed we were so amazed at the cleanliness and hygiene of the place. 
How I wish more doctors would be like her. 
I am a big fan of Dr Chaitanya for life . I owe her all my leftover teeth.
Thank you doctor. I am able to finally able to smile with your help. 
If you are looking for a dentist who will take care Of you and will actually help you get your smile back then pls go to her 
Regards 
Ria & Raveen
reply_text: Thank u so much üòä means a lot..

I felt they should have a DG ,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
****** ********** *** ** **** ********** *** ******* ** **** ***** She is so friendly. She is so calm and composed. Doesn't get angry at all. Has very good patience. She will be in contact through WhatsApp, if needed. Clearer explanation of our issue and exact treatment is provided by the doctor. Provides great service. ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* **** * *** ****

Atmosphere of the hospital is pleasant. During corona time, they have maintained the hospital very clean. Sanitizer is fully automated at the entrance door. Gloves for both hands and feet were provided before entering the hospital.

I would give 9 out of 10 for this hospital for dental treatment and surgeries. Support staff are good. They just need more experience to cope up with the doctor.

Cost is also very affordable.

I'm very much impressed with the service which I had got for my Wisdom Tooth Extraction Surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavity Filling,
review:
I had first visited clinic on 2019 for RCT,  since then I got completely assured on my dental issues. 

*** ** **** ******* * **** ********** ** **** She explains issues and also tells the process or method she is handling to cure.

Now I recommend her for my family and friends.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: would not recommend ********* *** ****** ***** ***********it was 50minutes ordeal for me and still doctor could not pull out my complete teeth.one root is still pending.stiches came out in 3 days and caused lot of pain and late healing of wound.even after 2 months ,I am having acute pain in surgery area.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor saw me at the scheduled appointment time. The professionalism shown by the doctor was very confidence building and I was more than satisfied with the entire experience at the clinic. At least now I have a trusted person who I can visit for my dental issues.
